topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551244d963687207087b0300#post_551244d963687207087b0300
The game was pretty much simple.
Crashed your car in the middle of nowhere, finds a shack, jumpscare ghost (it's a kid), puzzles and stuff.

If you don't play some kind of music box in the end, the kid kills you. If you do, you have to make a shiv using the stuff in the room while the kid sleeps due to the music. Then, kill it.

Apparently, the story goes with the kid going into the woods, disappear for a couple of days, return only to be covered by wolf's blood, and became creepy. Then, something happened the family. The song was played by his dad, who used it to calm him down. The dad's remains are found in the second last room, holding the said music box.

It just carry nightmares with me.

The game was pretty much simple.
Crashed your car in the middle of nowhere, finds a shack, jumpscare ghost (it's a kid), puzzles and stuff.

If you don't play some kind of music box in the end, the kid kills you. If you do, you have to make a shiv using the stuff in the room while the kid sleeps due to the music. Then, kill it.

Apparently, the story goes with the kid going into the woods, disappear for a couple of days, return only to be covered by wolf's blood, and became creepy. Then, something happened the family. The song was played by his dad, who used it to calm him down. The dad's remains are found in the second last room, holding the said music box.

It just carry nightmares with me.[/bq]

@Did you play that in a Free Games site?@
